text: saantaakruj eyaraport se baahar aate hee taiksee vaalon se maaloom pada kee bambee band hai shiv sena vaalon ne hadataal karava rakhee hai aur sadakon par traiphik nahin chalane diya ja raha
vahaan se kolaaba pahunchana lagabhag asambhav tha
ab kya karen tabhee veena ko dhyaan aaya
usake door ke rishte kee mausee ka ek ladaka andheree mein kaheen rahata hai
lekin ghar ka pata bhee nahin tha
haan use yaad aaya usakee saas ka paitrol pamp hai
vaheen saantaakruj ke paas
usane dev ko bataaya aur taiksee vaale se poochha  andheree tak nahin ja paenge
vo to najadeek hai us taraph abhee gadabad nahin hai
vahaan to ja sakate hain
taiksee vaale ne kaha
lekin hamaare paas pata nahin hai bas itana maaloom hai unaka hee saantaakruj mein paitrol pamp hai
veena ne tab use bataaya
saantaakruj mein to paanchachhah paitrol pamp hain
naam maaloom hai paitrol pamp ka
naam to maaloom nahin haan us pamp ko ek aurat chalaatee hai
vahee usakee maalakin hai
veena ne aur koshish kee jaanakaaree dene kee
are sharad paitrol pamp kee baat kar rahee hain aap
chalie
vah to bas yaheen paas mein hai
taiksee vaale ke munh se yah sunakar sabhee ne raahat kee saans lee aur taiksee mein samaan rakhakar paitrol pamp kee or chal die
draeevar seedha paitrol pamp par unhen le aaya
veena aur dev taiksee se utar ka pamp ke ophis mein gae
vahaan baithee mahila ko veena ek najar mein pahachaan gaee
vah teenavarsh pahale deharaadoon mein unake ghar aaee thee aur vahaan das din rahee thee
mahila ne bhee veena ko dekhate hee pahachaan liya khushee se lapak kar uthee aur use gale lagaatee huee bolee  are veena betee aise achaanak main koee sapana to nahin dekh rahee
dekh leejie
aapaka pata dhoondh liya
chale the to dhyaan bhee nahin raha ki ghar se aapaka pata mangava letee
inase milie ye mere pati hain dev
veena ne dev ka parichay diya
tab dev ne unhen pranaam kiya
veena ne tab unhen bataaya  eyaraport se maaloom pada ki band ke kaaran sabhee raaston mein kaaphee todaphod ho rahee hai
isalie idhar aapake paas chale aae
are
kamaal hai
apana ghar hai chalo tum vahaan ajay hoga
tab unhonne taiksee vaale ko ghar ka pata bata diya
main shaam ko aaoongee tabhee baat karenge
devaveena ne tab unase vida lee
amit tab taiksee mein hee baitha tha
ajay us samay ghar par hee tha
veena va usake pati ko dekhakar badee garm joshee se unhen mila
baaton hee baaton mein dev ne use beemaaree ka bata diya
sab samaachaar sunakar ajay ka man bujhasa gaya
sahaanubhootivash usake mukh se nikala  aap log yaheen rahakar aspataal aa ja sakate hain
nevee nagar se to taata insteetyoot door padata hai
nahin ham aap logon ko kasht nahin de sakate
vyarth mein itanee pareshaanee hogee aapako
mere bhaee ne hamaare lie kuchhanakuchh intajaam kar liya hoga
dev ne usakee baat ka uttar diya
pareshaanee kaisee
ise aap apana ghar hee samajhie
ajay ne jab yah kaha to usakee patnee rashmi uthakar kamare se rasoee kee taraph chalee gaee
usake chehare ke bhaav veena ko kuchh achchhe nahin lage
paanchasaat minat baad rashmi ne ajay ko kichan se pukaara  ajay jara bheetar aana
chaay taiyaar hai
ajay uthane ko hua to veena ne usase kaha  tum baitho ajay
main jaatee hoon
isase pahale ki ajay kuchh bolata veena bheetar chalee gaee
lekin rashmi shaayad ajay ko hee bulaana chaah rahee thee
veena ne dekha rashmi kuchh chupasee hai
lekin usake manobhaavon ko padhane kee apeksha muskaan bikherate hue bolee  lao main tumhaaree madad karoon
nahin aap rahane den
aap baithiye pleej jara ajay ko hee bhej den
usane apane chehare par muskaan bikherane kee cheshta kee  baajaar se kuchh mangavaana hai
are nahin takalluk kee koee baat nahin
veena ne kaha
lekin rashmi ne use phir se kaha  aap pleej baithiye
veena samajh gaee
shaayad patipatnee kee koee baat ho
achchha jaisa tum theek samajho
abhee bhejatee hoon ajay ko
veena ulate pair vaapis laut aaee
bheetar aakar usane ajay se kaha  jao ajay rashmi tumhen hee bula rahee hai
ajay anamanaasa utha
bheetar gaya aur rashmi se bola
bolo daarling
ye daarlingavaarling chhodo
is chhotese ghar mein tum inhen kis baat par kah rahe ho rakhane ke lie
phir suna nahin usake pati ko kainsar hai
main to ghar mein khaana nahin kha sakoongee
are
yah koee chhoot kee beemaaree to nahin
jaanatee ho main deharaadoon mein unake ghar maheenon raha hoon
meree kitanee aavabhagat kee thee
vah to theek hai lekin kisee beemaar ko ghar mein rakhana apane bas kee baat nahin
rashmi ne saaph shabdon mein kaha  phir ham bhee to mammee ke paas rah rahe hain
unakee chhooaachhoot ko bhee tum jaanate ho
kya kah rahee ho rashmi
vo apane hain unase kaisee chhuaachhoot
mammee se poochhana mammee kee kitanee seva kee thee unhonne
ajay ko apanee patnee kee baat par gussa aa raha tha
lekin jaise kuchh adhik kah sakane kee himmat nahin thee usamen
to ham bhee unakee mammee kee seva kar denge
bas ab tum unhen baarabaar rukane ko nahin kahoge
jab band khul jaega to svayan koee savaaree ka intajaam karake ya svayan unhen chhod aana tum
rashmi ne apana phaisala spasht suna diya ajay ko
ajay shaayad rashmi ko naaraaj nahin karana chaahata tha ya use usako naaraaj karane kee himmat hee nahin thee usase bola  chalo theek hai kuchh na kuchh tareeke se unhen bhej denge
abhee tum apana mood theek karo
vah baahar chalane ko hua ki rashmi ne kaha  ab chaay bhee utha kar le jao
varana vah samajhenge na jaane kya baat kar rahe the
ajay ne tab kuchh nahin kaha
rashmi ne chaay kee tre usake haath mein thama dee
ajay ko chaay laate dekhakar hee veena samajh gaee ki baajaar bhejane ke bahaane rashmi usase kuchh kahana chaah rahee thee
kya kahana chaah rahee thee vah samajh gaee
usane bhee man mein thaan liya ki vah bhee yahaan jyaada der nahin rukenge
chaay samaapt karake vah svayan dev se bolee  dev tum bhaee saahab se phon par baat kar lo
vah bhee chinta kar rahe honge
unase hee kaho kisee savaaree ka intajaam karake hamen le jaen
are
aisee kya baat hai itanee jaldee kya hai
ajay ne ekadam se kaha
ajay ko jaise man maangee muraad mil gaee thee
veena ne usake chehare par raahat ke chinh bhaanp lie the
bolee  nahin ajay bhaiya hamaaree prateeksha kar rahe honge
hamaara unheen ke paas jaana hee uchit rahega
veena ne apane shabdon par jor daalate hue kaha is par ajay bola  main to keval rikvest hee kar sakata hoon aage aapakee marjee
abhee kuchh der aaraam kar leejie
shorasharaaba thoda kam ho jaega
shaam ko main hee shivasena kee aimbulens ka intajaam kar doonga
usamen jaane se koee kathinaee nahin hogee
veena ne dekha rashmi ke chehare par tab vahee muskaan utar aaee thee jo unake aane ke samay usane bikheree thee
ramesh ne unake thaharane ke lie intajaam kar liya tha
nevee nagar mein hee ek opheesar ek maheene kee chhuttee par ja raha tha
usane usake phlait kee chaabee le lee
aur unako vaheen thahara diya
vah svayan mes mein thahara tha
maalatee va bachche abhee gova mein hee the
dev ko khaane peene ka kaaphee parahej tha isalie unhen phlait mein thahar kar achchha laga
veena usake lie svayan khaana bana sakatee thee
agale din aspataal jaane se pahale ve log charch get gae
vahaan unhen mistar shaah se milana tha jo sanstha ke varishth sadasy the
dev ko mistar shaah kee haisiyat nahin maaloom thee
jab ve sabhee unake ophis pahunche to amit va veena ko ek baar jhijhak huee
mistar shaah kee kampanee va ophis dekhakar hee unhonne anumaan laga liya ki vah koee bahut bade bijanesamain hain
risepshanist ko apana parichay diya dev ne aur ve pratiksha karane lage
kshan bhar pashchaat hee andar se bulaava aa gaya
veena va amit baahar hee baithe rah gae
dev akela bheetar gaya
mistar shaah apane kamare mein akele the
dev ko dekhakar unhonne khade hokar dev ke abhivaadan ka uttar diya aur use baithane ko kaha
isase pahale ki dev kuchh kahata vah bole  mujhe aaj subah hee mistar garg ka phon aaya tha
unhonne saaree baat bataee
aap chinta na karen
main abhee phon karake doktar saamant se aapakee det phiks karava deta hoon
vah aapaka achchhee tarah se nireekshan karenge or usake baad jo hoga vah tay kar lenge
aapaka bahutabahut shukriya
dev tab itana kah saka
mistar shaah phir dev se usakee beemaaree ka poochhane lage
dev ne vistaar se unhen sab bata diya
tabhee jaise kuchh dhyaan ho aaya mistar shaah ko bole  aap dillee se akele aae hain kya
naheennaheen meree patnee va mera chhota bhaee mere saath hain
vah baahar baithe hain
dev ne unhen bataaya
are
aapane unhen baahar kyon bithaaya hai  isase pahale ki dev kuchh kahata mistar shaah ne intarakom par apanee risepshanist ko veena va amit ko bheetar bhejane ko kaha
kshan bhar pashchaat hee amit va veena bheetar aa gae
mistar shaah ne uthakar unaka svaagat kiya aur veena se kaha  maidam aap bilkul phikr na karen
mujhase jo ban padega main madad karoonga
oopar vaala sabakee madad karata hai
veena keval muskura sakee unakee baat sunakar
ek ajay va rashmi ka vyavahaar aur doosara mistar shaah ka
kitana antar dikha use apane aur paraaye mein
dekhie opeedee do baje shuroo ho jaatee hai
aap yahaan se seedhe chalakar vaheen pahunch jaeee
main abhee doktar saamant se baat kar loonga
apana kaard banavaakar aap seedhe hee unakee sekretaree ke paas chale jaana
vah aapako unase milava degee
koee pareshaanee ho to aap mujhe phon kar deejiega
main sab sambhaal loonga
tab dev ne sabako uthane ka ishaara kiya
ve log uthe to mistar shaah ne uthate hue dev se haath milaate hue kaha  meree shubhakaamanaen aapake saath hain
eeshvar aapakee raksha karega
ve sab unaka abhivaadan kar baahar aa gae
doktar saamant ne dev kee sabhee ripotars dhyaan se padheen
aise kes unake lie aamasee baat thee
bole  dekhie
phaeenal stej to nahin aaee lekin ek baat ab aapako samajh lenee chaahie ab dava se jyaada dua kaam aaegee
main aapako davaeeyaan likh deta hoon
vah niyamit roop se lete rahie aur kal se hee rediyotharaipee karavaanee shuroo kar deejie
rediyotharaipee se koee phaayada hoga doktar  dev ne poochha
haan phaayada itana hoga ki rogaanu kam se kam speed mein
phailenge
beemaaree jad se to khatm nahin hogee lekin usakee raphtaar dheemee pad jae yahee hamaaree koshish ho sakatee hai
dev ne mahasoos kiya ki kainsar ka ilaaj karate samay doktar apaneeapanee alag raay rakhate hain
koee mareez ko aasha kee kiran dikhaata hai aur koee niraash kar deta hai
doktar saamant ne tab davaee likh deen aur parcha dev ko thamaate hue bole  aap abhee rediyotharaipee dipaartament mein chale jaeee aur kal ka koee samay le leejie
bas itanee see baat huee doktar saamant se
dev apane saath veena va amit ko lie rediyotharaipee dipaartament kee or chal pada
agale din subah nau baje ka samay lekar ve log nevee nagar laut aae
teenon chup the
is gahan chuppee ko koee todana nahin chaahata tha
lekin ek baat thee ki sach ko sabane apane gale se neeche utaar liya tha
shaam ko amit ne vistaar se sab baat ramesh bhaee ko bata deen
ve use bahut adhik chintit lage
rediyotharaipee shuroo hue saat din ho gae the
doktar maalatee thee jo dev ka treetament kar rahee thee
veena dev ke paas baithee rahatee thee
doktar maalatee ko baaton se maaloom hua dev ke vishay mein
vah unase kaaphee ghanishth ho gaee thee
aise mein ek din jab veena ne unase poochha  doktar dev ko isase kuchh aaraam milega bhee
tab maalatee dev ko hee nihaar rahee thee
man mein soch rahee thee ki is mareej ke chehare ko dekhakar bhala kaun kah sakata hai ki yah bas kuchh dinon ya kuchh maheenon ka mehamaan hai
vah svayan bhaavuk ho uthee
tabhee veena ke prashn ne usakee bhaavukata ko aur badha diya
abhee jooniyar doktar thee lekin apane mareejon kee manodasha ko samajhatee thee
ekaek usakee aankhen bhar aaeen
bolee veena se  main tumhen dekhatee hoon veena to bada ajeeb lagata hai

kaise sah rahee ho yah sab tumhaare pati ko dekhatee hoon to sochatee hoon ki aisa kya isee insaan ke saath karana tha eeshvar ko kitanee sundar jodee hai tumhaaree lekin is rediyotharaipee se dev ko kuchh nahin milane vaala
jo hona tha vah to ho chuka
ab to is jindagee ko yadi koee sukh de sakata hai to vah keval bhagavaan hee hai
aur koee nahin
main pahale din hee kah detee
lekin phir socha tum donon padhe likhe ho
doktar se saaree baat kar aae ho
na jaane kya hai tumhaare man mein
lekin ab dekha itane dinon se ki tum sab jo kuchh samajh rahe ho sach usase alag hai
main jooniyar hoon
abhee shurooaat hai mere doktaree jeevan kee
lekin paaya hai kainsar ka ilaaj karate samay ham sab andhere mein teer chalaate hain
sab kuchh karake dekhate hain
shaayad mareez bach jae
aapakee raay mein is rediyotharaipee se kuchh phaayada nahin hoga  dev ne poochha doktar se
phaayada nahin hoga balki nukasaan hee hoga
tumhaare aakhiree dinon mein dardatakaleeph jyaada hogee
doktar maalatee ne saaph shabdon mein kaha
phir mujhe kya karana chaahie
mera koee ilaaj   dev jaise svayan ko taiyaar kar chuka tha
is avastha mein koee nahin
bas himmat nahin haaranee chaahie
doktar maalatee ne aansoo ponchh lie the kyonki tab veena phootaphoot kar rone lagee thee
doktar maalatee use chup karaane lagee thee
thodee der mein dev kee tharaipee pooree ho gaee
agalee taareekh ke lie doktar maalatee ne kaard mein jaise hee likhana shuroo kiya tab dev ne kaha  nahin doktar main ab nahin aaoonga
main kal hee dillee chala jaoonga
tab doktar maalatee ne kuchh socha aur kaha  jaisa tum theek samajho
main bhee tumhaare lie eeshvar se praarthana karoongee isase pahale ki dev va veena baahar nikalate vaho uthakar baatharoom mein chalee gaee
shaayad vah apanee rulaee nahin rok pa rahee thee
